metadata.title: CVE-2022-2953 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in extractImageSection intools/tiffcrop.c:6905, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service viaa crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fixis available with commit 48d6ece8.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
